story.title: Feature: Perform arithematic operations using 2 numbers

scenario.title: Adding 2 numbers
scenario.step: Given The values of first and second numbers are 3 and 5 respectively
When Adding first and second numbers
Then Sum of 2 numbers is greater then 0

scenario.title: Multiplying 2 numbers
scenario.step: Given The values of first and second numbers are 3 and 5 respectively
When Multiplying first and second numbers
Then Product of 2 numbers is greater then 10java.lang.AssertionError: Expecting: <2> to be greater than: <10>
